mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_title, post_content, post_type, member_profile_id) values (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, 'INQUIRY', #{memberProfileId})
mapper.select: select p.id as postId, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_content as postContent, p.created_date as postCreatedDate, mp.profile_name as profileName, mp.profile_email as profileEmail, i.inquiry_status as inquiryStatus, a.admin_answer_content as answerContent, a.created_date as answerDate from tbl_post p join tbl_inquiry i on p.id = i.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id left join tbl_admin_answer a on i.id = a.inquiry_id where p.post_type = 'INQUIRY' order by p.created_date desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}
select count(*) from tbl_post p join tbl_inquiry i on p.id = i.id where p.post_type = 'INQUIRY'
select admin_answer_content as answerContent, created_date as answerDate from tbl_admin_answer where inquiry_id = #{inquiryId} order by created_date desc limit 1
